HDG.LOG.content: attention as Gehör [?] > our type of attention means we belong to the logos > omologein: [a yes to the yes of logos?]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: attention as Gehör [?] > our type of attention means we belong to the logos > omologein: [a yes to the yes of logos?]

HDG.FS.content: can one say “Being is enowned through enowning (Sein ist durch das Ereignis ereignet)?” answer: yes > question of Ereignis [beyond Seinsfrage?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: can one say “Being is enowned through enowning (Sein ist durch das Ereignis ereignet)?” answer: yes > question of Ereignis [beyond Seinsfrage?]

HDG.EC.content: malice is insurgency (Aufrührerische), das im Grimmigen beruht (rests in furiousness) > essence of evil is rage (Ingrimm) of insurgency (furiousness conceals this rage, in a certain sense) > perhaps the will itself is what is evil > yes, perhaps
